body.name: Libman Tornado Mop Refills | Self Wringing Mop | Cotton Mop Head | Twist Mop | Twist Mop Head Replacement | Machine Washable | 4 Self Wring Mop Heads | Direct Replacement Heads for The Tornado Mop
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Saturday, February 17. Order within 2 hrs 39 mins
features: MULTI-SURFACE: The self wringing Mop can be used on Hardwood, Vinyl, Laminate, Ceramic, Marble, Stone, and more! NOT for use on unfinished, oiled or waxed boards and unsealed tiles
ABSORBENT MOP HEAD: Libman Tornado Twist Mop's heavy duty mop head is strong, absorbent and features 50% more floor coverage than others in its class, allowing for a more efficient and quicker clean
GRIP N' CLICK: Never touch a wet mop head again with the innovative self-wringing system. Developed in early 2000 with minor tweaks and adjustments for performance and reliability
WASHABLE: The cotton mop heads can be hand or machine washed with warm water. To keep the mop head looking new, it's recommended to use a mesh laundry bag if machine washed. Hang to Dry
4 TOTAL REFILLS: Included are four Tornado Mop Refills, which are the direct replacement for your Libman Tornado Mop. Enjoy the same high-quality experience with these convenient and durable refills
body.description: Looking for a hassle-free way to keep your floors spotless? Look no further than the Libman Tornado Mop & Three Refills, the ultimate cleaning solution with its innovative Grip N' Click ratchet system. This mop set can tackle even the toughest dirt and grime with ease, thanks to its durable cotton mop head and sturdy handle. With its unique design, you can easily reach into corners and twist dry in a single motion, making cleaning a quick and efficient process. Suitable for all types of floors, including tile, laminate, and hardwood surfaces, this twist mop will leave your floors sparkling clean. The mop head is also replaceable, and with the Libman Tornado Mop Head Refills, you can quickly swap out the old one for a fresh one. The washable mop heads ensure that you'll always have a clean mop, ready to go! For best results, hand wash in warm water and hang to dry. If washing by hand isn't your thing, put the mop head in a mesh laundry bag and wash on a delicate setting with warm water, hang to dry. You can expect consistent, excellent results every time you clean. So why wait? Order yours today and make cleanliness a top priority at home!

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Libman Cleaning Tools The Libman Company has been manufacturing quality cleaning tools in the U.S. since 1896. With the corporate headquarters just feet away from the manufacturing plant, we are able to closely oversee the quality of our products. Our team carefully inspects all raw materials coming into the plant and all finished goods out the door to ensure our products perform to your expectations. The Libman Company has a long history as a family owned and operated business and is currently managed by the 4th generation of the Libman family. Libman is a strong brand with distribution across the United States, Canada, and many other countries. Libman is doing its part - by installing 2,600 solar panels we create 1 million kW of solar power annually. Our brooms are made using recycled water bottles and PET plastic. Each year, Libman saves 12,000 trees, 5 million gallons of water, and 9,000 gallons of oil as a result of its environmental focus.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best price i could find on these hard to find replacement mop heads.
reviews.reviewText: I absolutely love these mop heads. They are cotton and washable. it is very nice to have extras on hand so you can ensure your floors are being mopped with clean mop heads. I did the research and this was the best price and value I could find. Shipping was fast and I now have extras in my cleaning supplies so if we have another Covid-like event I am armed and ready with extra mop heads!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars great value over the single pack
reviews.reviewText: These mop heads are authentic Libman and work as advertised and at a great price from Amazon.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars They fit and work as expected
reviews.reviewText: Bought these to have spares to mop the tile patio and they work. Throw them in the washer to clean and use again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 25, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on September 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice to have a new mop head without having to buy a whole new mop!
reviews.reviewText: Works as you would expect it to!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars They really don't last
reviews.reviewText: They really don't last. I use them for mopping 3 floors in all. If you keep wringing the mop it eventually gets messed up. They become heavy and fall to one side after completing your mopping. When you go to put it up on a hook and go to use about the mop after about the 5th time its time to throw out. Mind you when it falls to the side as said before you will have to wring by hand. I kept buying the mop heads over and over. No more for me.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 3, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Perfect replacement for the original mop heads and at a fair price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Not like the original mop heads
reviews.reviewText: These mop heads are definitely not the best quality. The ones I purchased are twisted with a lot of loose strings. You can definitely see that they’re not as good as the individual ones you can buy from a store. They will work, but I won’t be buying them again.
